contest-event.event-date:
Aug. 5, 1899 D Middleton In Teesdale Contest
Middleton in Teesdale Contest 0 Own Choice Test Piece Contest
middleton-in-teesdale-contest
None
Middleton House Park, Middleton-in-Teesdale, County Durham, England, UK 1st prize £10. 2nd prize £6. 3rd prize £4. 4th prize £3. 5th prize £2. March contest 1st (£1) Cleveland Steel Works, 2nd West Hartlepool Borough. 6 bands competed.
Open to bands which had not won a prize of over £10 in 1898 or 1899
April 18, 2012, 12:39 p.m. Jan. 11, 2017, 8:11 p.m.
1 Cleveland Steel Works Unknown
2 Hartlepool Borough Prize S. Inglesant
3 Murton Colliery Band Edward Vest
4 Cornsay Bryce Gordon
5 Sunderland East End John Mackintosh
6 Cockfield Unknown
